full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Automated Chemistry Analyzer**

*   **Contract Reference:** WS3994297458-Doc3994674035
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Publication Date:** August 4, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** August 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3994297458
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2024
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

The Government of Canada has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of an Automated Chemistry Analyzer (ACA) and associated services. The end-user entity is Indigenous Services Canada, located in Norway House, Manitoba.

Key Highlights:
*   **Equipment Requirements:** The successful bidder will provide one new Dry Automated Chemistry Analyzer, which will be installed on-site and accompanied by user training.
*   **Sourcing Notes:** Tenders are open to all eligible suppliers and can be submitted electronically through the CanadaBuys or Ariba Discovery platforms.
*   **Delivery Requirements:** The bidder is responsible for delivering the equipment and providing the required services on or before the expected contract start date.
*   **Conditions of Contract:** The contract will be awarded to the bidder providing the lowest-priced proposal, as per the competitive tender process.
*   **All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on August 29, 2023, to be considered responsive.

Interested suppliers can access the RFP documentation through the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17077830>

Contact Information:

Matthew Havrilenko, Purchasing Contracting Official

matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

To be considered for this procurement, please submit your proposal on or before the tender closing date and ensure all supporting documentation is attached. We look forward to receiving your proposal. Mark your calendar for the closing date: August 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Good luck!  [1](mailto:matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 1: Matthews email.  To be clear, he is a spam-linked email as all the numbers on this list are fake. mark Goldin christo
